TEXT.S: ci Huang Pens Le-aw (kamu nu Hulam: , Juan Ponce de León) i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1513) a mihcaan nu aydaay a Florida (Fou-luo-li-ta-cuo ) makatukuh, cacay a milbut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henadu.sutuo (, Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatukuh i Florida (Fuo-luo-li-ta ), micumud aca tayda i Misisi-pi a sauwacmitahaw, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keluonatu ( Francisco Vázquezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebtu lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebung nu Si-pan-yaku Mexico (Muo-si-ke ) pasaydan i amis muculil. mangalay mikilim tu nakamuwan nu babalaki a Sipuo-laci tukay ( (Seven Cities of Cibola), amica kunikacaay ka tepa', naculilan mamin ku Yalisan-na a cascasan ( Grand Canyon) atu "Tay-pinyun a enal" (, Great Plains).
